title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Why Your Processor Matters for AI Inference and General Compute (MAM210)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 为什么处理器对AI推理和通用计算至关重要 (MAM210)
abstract: Discover how AMD powered Amazon EC2 instances are transforming cloud economics for AI and compute. Explore why CPU-based inference is gaining momentum for modern workloads and how enterprises leverage EC2 to optimize both performance and cost. And, gain insights from CVS, a leading health solutions company, on their FinOps strategy driving efficiency, actionable insights, and reinvestment into next-gen innovation. This presentation is brought to you by AMD, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 探索AMD驱动的Amazon EC2实例如何改变AI和计算的云经济学。了解为什么基于CPU的推理在现代工作负载中获得发展势头，以及企业如何利用EC2优化性能和成本。此外，从领先的健康解决方案公司CVS获得洞察，了解他们的FinOps策略如何推动效率、可操作的洞察和对下一代创新的再投资。本演示由AWS合作伙伴AMD为您呈现。
